you
every way look phones of people always
in a hurry one of the most populous
cities in the world where time is money
Mumbai marathons are swaggered ahi hi
I'm yoga and this is my city surrounded
by the Arabian Sea it's hard to believe
that this humming metropolis is once
just a cluster of islands it all changed
when Portugal seized control in the 16th
century
look hard enough and youth still
discover areas of Portuguese colonial
influence this settlement is one of them
some of these homes are more than 200
years old but they are vanishing fast
high-rise flats taking their place
Bombay is becoming a concrete jungle and
in the end we will need beautiful quiet
places like Hitachi Valley just agreed
we may be able to save a small part of
the city but with the rest of the city
being destroyed the way it is I wonder
what our children will be left with the
skyline is transforming but what has
really affected the lives of Mumbai cars
are the violent attacks seen in recent
years yet what's striking is how quickly
the city moves on it's a tough place
difficult to travel around and often I
feel as though I
me but if it all gets too much this is
the place you can escape to just look
out to see nothing's happening which is
perfect Mumbai will give you a fair
chance if you're willing to work hard
many come to the city to become a star
after all it is the home of Bollywood
this dance class may be in a shantytown
but the dreams here are big everyone
from Slumdog to millionaire is just
crazy about the movies minotaur to see
my body open for hot body support when I
grew up I want to be such a big
superstar that when I walk on the
streets every person should recognize me
they should point to me and say isn't
she the same girl from that famous movie
cricket is the only other pastime that
unites us Mumbai guys watch Li there is
one more thing despite all our problems
we're eternal optimist it all looks a
bit mad but this is laughter yoga
practitioner swear that having a good
giggle is the key to a healthy and happy
life in long way if the life is
stressful we would say you come and join
us you forget all your problems your
depressions laughter is crazy no it's
let them come and try it out oh it's
excellent and the best medicine for your
life at times I do feel frustrated that
the people deserve better but there's
not time to dwell on what could have
been here every day ends not with a
sense of hopelessness but eager
anticipation of what tomorrow can bring
Mumbai is my city
